name: 4-to-2 Encoder
description: Create a 4-to-2 encoder: convert one-hot 4-bit input to 2-bit binary output
fullDescription: The encoder is the opposite of a decoder. It converts a one-hot input (where exactly one input is active) to its binary representation. A 4-to-2 encoder has 4 inputs (I3-I0) and 2 outputs. When I0 is HIGH, output is 00; when I1 is HIGH, output is 01; when I2 is HIGH, output is 10; when I3 is HIGH, output is 11. Encoders are used in keyboards, interrupt handling, and data compression circuits.
